comments: See the reference for precise definition.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. Curtright, Counting symmetry patterns in the spectra of strings, in H. J. de Vega and N. Sánchez, editors, String Theory, Quantum Cosmology and Quantum Gravity. Integrable and Conformal Invariant Theories. World Scientific, Singapore, 1987, pp. 304-333.
Simon Plouffe, Approximations de séries génératrices et quelques conjectures, Dissertation, Université du Québec à Montréal, 1992.
Plouffe, Simon, Master's Thesis, copy at the arXiv site
formula: G.f.: Product (1 - x^k)^{-c(k)}; c(k) = 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 2, 2, 3, 3, 4, 4, ....Euler transform gives sequence with g.f. = x^3/((x+1)*(x-1)^2), _Simon Plouffe_, Master's Thesis, UQAM 1992.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
